title: Reference Exchange
description: small set of meta data that is exchanged from a MOD to ABC to establish and update PubMed corpus

primaryID.description: The globally unique identifier for the object.  ie: NLMId or ISBN or MOD ID. Each identifier should be prefixed and of the form prefix:id

allianceCategory.description: a higher level classification for publications. can also be thought of as a helper grouping for search (ie: facet value).
